description: Floor of arithmetic-geometric mean of n and prime(n).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
prog: (PARI) v=[]; for(n=1,120,v=concat(v,floor(agm(n, prime(n))))); v(PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b061979.txt", n, " ", floor(agm(n, prime(n)))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 29 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 26 2001
